jobDescription: Airbnb has become a global platform that connects travelers and hosts from over 34,000 cities. Our mission is to enable a world where anyone can belong anywhere. Expanding our community to new types of hosts is critical to our mission.  Airbnb's Pro Host team helps professional hosts thrive on our platform. As a Data Scientist within the Pro Host team, you will design metrics, create dashboards and build pipelines to make our global and cross-functional team more data informed.  Candidates for Pro Host Data Scientist should have: A passion for Airbnb’s mission of helping people Belong Anywhere3+ years of work experienceAdvanced degree in a quantitative field preferredA “business owner” mindset, with a keen interest in strategy and operationsStrong interpersonal and relationship-building skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsAbility to identify and “sell” data-informed business recommendations to stakeholdersFluency in the core toolkit of Data Science:Python/R, SQL/Hive, unix/scriptingManipulating large-scale data setsBuilding data pipelinesImplementing visualizations, dashboards, and reportsExperimental design and interpretationDescriptive and predictive modeling
